channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: KubeCon EU 2024: Highlights from Paris
item.description: If you stopped by the KubeCon EU 2024 Docker booth, you may have seen our Megennis Motorsport Racing experience. Or you may have talked to one of our engineers about our new fast Docker Build Cloud experience. We round up a few other highlights from Paris. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/kubecon-eu-2024-highlights-from-paris/

item.title: Empower Your Development: Dive into Dockerâ€™s Comprehensive Learning Ecosystem
item.description: Find out about Docker's multifaceted approach to developer education, including partnerships with platforms like Udemy and LinkedIn Learning, official docs and use-cases, and content created by Docker Captains and the developer community. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-learning-ecosystem/

item.title: OpenSSH and XZ/liblzma: A nation-state attack was thwarted, what did we learn?
item.description: Docker CTO Justin Cormack looks at what we can learn from malicious code in upstream tarballs of xz targeted at a subset of OpenSSH servers. "It is hard to overstate how lucky we were here, as there are no tools that will detect this vulnerability." Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/openssh-and-xz-liblzma/

item.title: Building a Video Analysis and Transcription Chatbot with the GenAI Stack
item.description: Dive into a video transcription and chat project that leverages the GenAI Stack, along with seamless integration provided by Docker, to streamline video content processing and understanding. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/building-a-video-analysis-and-transcription-chatbot-with-the-genai-stack/

item.title: containerd vs. Docker: Understanding Their Relationship and How They Work Together
item.description: Learn what containerd is, how Docker and containerd work together, and how their combined strengths can improve developer experience. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/containerd-vs-docker/

item.title: Is Your Container Image Really Distroless?
item.description: Find out what makes an image distroless, tools that make the creation of distroless images practical, and security benefits of this approach. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/is-your-container-image-really-distroless/
